anya-e1009n:67_0: Vīriyavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhati;
anya-e1009n:349_5: Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro dhammā paññā-
anya-e1009n:707_0: Yaṃ na vade na taṃ kare;
anya-e1009n:1210_0: A-satī ca sā so pana mittaṃ-dubbho,
anya-e1009n:1218_5: Pariṇattabhojī ca hoti. Kāla- cārī ca, brahma- cārīca.
anya-e1009n:1218_6: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā āyussāti.
anya-e1009n:1219_7: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā āyussāti.
anya-e1009n:1225_8: Imekho bhikkhave pañca caṅkame āni saṃsāti.
